name: Escape Room - Lost in Space
summary: You've just woken up from hibernation, still groggy and disoriented, when an urgent voice breaks through the haze, it’s the ship's AI. Your crew is in grave danger, scattered across the drifting vessel that’s barely holding together. Critical systems are failing, oxygen levels are dropping, and a mysterious presence seems to lurk in the shadows of the abandoned corridors. There’s no time to lose.
